bugs.summary: Perma [android] TEST-UNEXPECTED-TIMEOUT | /mediacapture-record/MediaRecorder-peerconnection.https.html | TestRunner hit external timeout (this may indicate a hang When Gecko 83 merges to Beta on 2020-10-19
Make child process to send offset to parent process, not index
fallible example code in comment is incorrect
only clear PresShell::mResolutionUpdated after the apz transaction
factor waitToClearOutAnyPotentialScrolls out from various tests and put it in apz_test_utils.js

Pass the BrowserParent's browsing context to UpdateSessionStore instead of getting it from the frame element's frameloader.
